General.Name: Stroeer SE & Co. KGaA
General.Description: Ströer SE & Co. KGaA provides out-of-home media and online advertising solutions in Germany and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Out-of-Home (OOH) Media, Digital & Dialog Media, and Data As A Service (DaaS) & E-Commerce. It offers various outdoor advertising media services, such as traditional posters; advertisements at bus and tram shelters, and on public transport; and digital advertising installations. The company also operates t-online.de, which publishes news, analyses, reports and interviews; information services for digital natives through special interest portals, such as giga.de, familie.de, desried.de, and kino.de; and call centers for telecommunications, energy, IT, tourism, multimedia, and e-commerce sectors. In addition, it provides Statista, a platform for business data as a service that offers market and consumer data, and bundles statistical data; and asambeauty, a streaming-based live shopping beauty platform. Ströer SE & Co. KGaA is based in Cologne, Germany.
